title: URGENT: Server issues? Stuck in champ select.
body:
I'm in champ select and it says "Prepare to battle" but it won't take anyone to the loading screen. It's just stuck there. I've tried restarting the launcher but when I click on reconnect, it doesn't do anything. I played a game before that and it was fine but the end screen was stuck on loading stats. I skipped it and  when I tried to join another queue, it said "You will not be allowed to join the queue because you are currently assigned to an existing game". That went away and it allowed me to join queue but now this.

Help me Riot! I don't want to be punished for this.

replies.body:
Im also stuck in the prepare for battle screen when i left the lobby so that i could maybe reconnect or hope the game didnt start and just reset itself it wont allow me to reconnect. this was going to be my first game today, and i'm really upset that somerhing like this has happened plzz help.
My whole team was also caught in this trap, as we had a gr8 conversation involving this matter.
I was just taken into the game then...
